articles.description: Harry Kane's thinly-veiled criticism of England absentees increases current sense of drift.
articles.title: Harry Kane: Does criticism expose England's cracks?

articles.description: Scrum-half Jack van Poortvliet and full-back Freddie Steward start for England against South Africa as head coach Steve Borthwick makes four changes to his starting XV.
articles.title: England v South Africa: Freddie Steward and Jack van Poortvliet among four England changes

articles.description: Claudio Ranieri is appointed head coach of Roma until the end of the season - six months after announcing his retirement.
articles.title: Claudio Ranieri ends retirement to become Roma manager

articles.description: Three-time Olympic skiing medallist Lindsey Vonn is returning to the sport more than five years after retiring.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn: American skiing great to come out of retirement aged 40

articles.description: Some teams from this year's men's T20 World Cup are yet to pay players their full prize money, according to the World Cricketers' Association.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Some teams yet to pay players prize money - World Cricketers' Association

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he would "pay to play" for Europe in the Ryder Cup in the wake of reports that American golfers will each receive $400,000 (£350,000) to compete in next year's contest.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Rory McIlroy and Europeans will not follow US lead of paying players in New York

articles.description: Taylor Fritz boosts his hopes of reaching the last four of the ATP Finals with a comeback victory against Australia's Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: ATP Finals: Taylor Fritz beats Alex de Minaur to boost last-four hopes

articles.description: The Nations League matches with Croatia and Poland could determined Scotland's World Cup hopes. Here's why...
articles.title: Scotland v Croatia: Why next five days are key to World Cup hopes

articles.description: BBC Sport sits down with Jake Paul to try understand how the YouTuber turned boxer has become such a phenomenon.
articles.title: Mike Tyson v Jake Paul: How the YouTube 'Problem Child' became a stadium boxing star

articles.description: Monaco will continue to host Formula 1 races until at least 2031 after a new six-year deal is agreed.
articles.title: Monaco agrees extension to host Formula 1 until at least 2031
